titleStmt.title: [Newyddion mawr oddiwrth y ser. Neu almanacc am y flwŷddŷn o oedran y bŷd, 5649. Ac am y flwŷddŷn o oedran Crist 1700.]
titleStmt.author: Jones, Thomas, 1648-1713.

notesStmt.note: Title and publication information conjectured from other eds.
Imperfect: fragment, 16 of 48? p., beginning with B₄; torn, faded, and with broken and missing type, and print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru/National Library of Wales, Aberystwyth, Wales.
